column26: Always also implies mopeds with a maximum design speed of 25km/h
Prohibition of large goods vehicles (with total weight larger than 3.5 t, including any load).
Applies also to axles being apart not more than 1 metre.

column1: No vehicles carrying dangerous water pollutants
Minimum safe following distance between vehicles
No overtaking by heavy goods vehicles
No horns or excessive motor noise
column26: REPLACEDby signno. 4.14This sign has been replaced by sign no. 4.14 "Hospital", since it was only used in this context!
